data.title: I-94 WB over PELHAM RD Wayne County, Michigan Bridge Inspection Report
data.meta_description: Get data on a variety of issues pertaining to Montgomery and the rest of Montgomery County, Alabama.Bridge Inpsecitons
data.text:
NBI Bridge Condition Fair

Inspection Date (Inspection Frequency): Nov. 2022 (Every 24 Months) Structural Evaluation: 6: Equal to present minimum criteria Deck Geometry9: Superior to present desirable criteria Underclear/Vertical and Horizontal: 5: Somewhat better than minimum adequacy to tolerate being left in place as is Deck6: SATISFACTORY CONDITION - structural elements show some minor deterioration. Superstructure7: GOOD CONDITION - some minor problems. Substructure6: SATISFACTORY CONDITION - structural elements show some minor deterioration. Channel/Channel ProtectionN: Not applicable. Use when bridge is not over a waterway (channel). CulvertsN: Not applicable. Use if structure is not a culvert. Waterway Adequacy: N: Bridge not over a waterway. Approach Roadway Alignment: 8: Equal to present desirable criteria Bridge PostingNo posting required: Equal to or above legal loads Scour Critical Bridges: N: Bridge not over waterway. Bridge Railings: 1: Inspected feature meets currently acceptable standards. Transitions: 1: Inspected feature meets currently acceptable standards. Approach Guardrail: 1: Inspected feature meets currently acceptable standards. Approach Guardrail Ends: 1: Inspected feature meets currently acceptable standards. Historical significance: 5: Bridge is not eligible for the National Register of Historic Places.

Designated Level of ServiceMainline Route Number: 00094 Inventory Route/Min Vert Clearance: 4.52 meters Kilometerpoint: 4.204 LRS Inventory Route: 0000015888 Subroute Number: 2 Bypass/Detour Length: 2.00 kilometers Toll: On free road. The structure is toll-free and carries a toll-free highway. Functional Class Of Inventory Route: Urban: Principal Arterial - Interstate Lanes On Structure: 4 Lanes Under Structure: 4 Design Load: MS 22.5 or HS 25 Approach Roadway Width: None meters Bridge Median: No median Skew: 4 Structure Flared: Yes, flared Navigation Control: Not applicable, no waterway. Structure Open/Posted/Closed: Open, no restriction Type of Service On Bridge: Highway Type of Service Under Bridge: Highway, with or without pedestrian Kind of Material/Design: Steel Type of Design/Construction: Stringer/Multi-beam or Girder Kind of Material/Design: Other Type of Design/Construction: Other Number Of Spans In Main Unit: 1 Number Of Approach Spans: 0 Inventory Route Total Horizontal Clearance: 24.30 meters Length Of Maximum Span: 36.10 meters Structure Length: None meters Left Curb/Sidewalk Width: None meters Right Curb/Sidewalk Width: None meters Bridge Roadway Width Curb-To-Curb: None meters Deck Width/Out-To-Out: None meters Minimum Vertical Clearance Over Bridge Roadway: None meters Reference Feature: Highway beneath structure Minimum Vertical Under Clearance: None meters Reference Feature: Highway beneath structure Minimum Lateral Under Clearance: None meters Minimum Lateral Under Clearance On Left: None meters Operating Rating (Method): None metric tons(6) Inventory Rating (Methon): None metric tons (6) STRAHNET Highway Designation: The inventory route is on a Interstate STRAHNET route. Parallel Structure Designation: The left structure of parallel bridges. This structure carries traffic in the opposite direction. Direction Of Traffic: 1-way traffic Highway System Of Inventory Route: Inventory Route is on the NHS Federal Lands Highways: Not applicable Deck Structure Type: Concrete Cast-in-Place Type of Wearing Surface: Monolithic Concrete (concurrently placed with structural deck) Type of Membrane: None Deck Protection: Epoxy Coated Reinforcing Designated National Network: The inventory route is part NBIS Bridge Length: Yes Minimum Navigation Vertical: None meters
